text.Prompt:
Item specification:
Replacement Remote Control for POLK SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT, RE13051, IHT4000

Item keywords:
Custom built remote made by Redi Remote for Polk remote control number RE13051
Not an original remote control, custom replacement remote
Compatible with following models of POLK units: SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT, RE13051, IHT4000, SURROUNDBAR 4000IHT, SURROUNDBAR 3000IHT, IHT3000, IHT6000
Cover over lower half of remote and slides down to reveal lower half buttons
Redi-Remotes cannot be programmed to control any auxillary devices. They will do every function for the specific unit they are designed to control.
Remote measures 7 1/2" x 2 1/4" x 3/4"
Redi-Remotes are not equipped with laser pointers or LED lights.

Product description:
text.Response A:
This custom replacement remote control is specifically designed to replace the original remote control for the Polk SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT, RE13051, IHT4000, SURROUNDBAR 4000IHT, and SURROUNDBAR 3000IHT units.

This remote is not an original remote control and is not programmed to control any auxillary devices. It is a custom replacement remote control that is compatible with the following models of Polk units:

- SURROUNDBAR 6000IHT
- RE13051
- IHT4000
- SURROUNDBAR 4000IHT
- SURROUNDBAR 3000IHT
- IHT3000
- IHT6000

This remote measures 7 1/2" x 2 1/4" x 3/4" and is designed to cover over the lower half of the original remote control and slides down to reveal the lower half buttons.

Redi-Remotes are not equipped with laser pointers or LED lights.

Please note that this is a replacement remote control and is not an original remote control.
text.Response B:
Redi-Remotes are custom replacement remote controls that are built by Redi-Remotes. They have no association with the manufacturer of the unit. They are simply replacements for the original remote controls.

Redi-Remotes are simple to use, and they are designed to replace the original remote control that comes with the unit you are using it with. They are not programmable, they simply do all the functions that the original remote control did.

Redi-Remotes are built to be easy to use, and are built so they can be used in low light situations. Their buttons are large and easy to read, and they have a large raised power button.

Redi-Remotes are designed to be easy to use in the dark, which means they are great for use in a home theater environment.

Redi-Remotes are custom built by Redi-Remotes, and are not original manufacturer remote controls.

Redi-Remotes are designed to be easy to use, and are designed to replace the original remote control that comes with the unit you are using it with. They are not programmable, they simply do all the functions that the original remote control did.

Redi-Remotes are built to be easy to use, and are built so they can be used in low light situations. Their buttons are large and easy to read, and they have a large raised power button.

Redi-Remotes are designed to be easy to use in the dark, which means they are great for use in a home theater environment.

Redi-Remotes are custom built by Redi-Remotes, and are not original manufacturer remote controls.

Product FAQ:
How many buttons does the remote control have, and how big are they?
The remote has 37 easy to read buttons that are large in size.

What is the battery life of the remote, and does it come with batteries?
This remote comes with a 12V battery.

Does this remote come with an owner’s manual, and if so, do you have a copy of it that I can look at?
Yes, this remote comes with an owner’s manual. You can view the manual by clicking on this link: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07N7J4QP8/

Is there a warranty on this remote control, and if so, what does it cover?

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
